Desc.entry: A voluntary group that works to improve the park grounds and amenities. Projects have included improving park pathways to ensure children can travel safely to school as well as bulb planting projects involving local school children and the park ranger service. Also organises various fund raising activities including fun days. The group has already succeeded in funding the installation of the new multi-games court and now seeks to install a zip-wire for the playground. New members welcome.
